short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multiple columns for viewing Ultimate-Guitar tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more scrolling pauses while playing guitar. Make use of the full width of your jumbotron screen. 😏🎸
 
This is in no way affiliated with Ultimate-Guitar.

Credits
Photo in Screenshot by rawpixel.com from Pexels

P.S. The extension is completely Open Source, contributions are welcome. 🤹‍♀️
